title: Dokotoo Womens 2025 Casual Dress Smocked Crewneck Button Up Long Sleeve Empire Waist A-Line Mini Dress
description: Size: S=US 4-6 , M=US 8-10 , L=US 12-14 , XL=US 16-18 , 2XL=US 20-22. *The buttons are decorative and can NOT open.*

Classic Features: This long sleeve dress showcases classic crewneck and decorative button design, complemented by smocked detail and empire waist. The flowy A-line hem of swing mini dress add a chic and elegant touch, making it a must-have for wardrobe.

Soft Fabric: Crafted from soft and airy fabric, this casual dress is both skin-friendly and breathable, ensuring all-day comfort. The solid color shows a versatile charm, which is easy to pair with a variety of accessories for different looks.

Various Occasions: Perfect for casual style and elegant wear, this shirt dress is suitable for many occasions, including beach outings, vacations, parties, wedding guests, club nights, dates, shopping trips, and daily wear. Its versatile design makes it an ideal choice for laid-back and chic events.
